name: rexbiia
params: setvar s0, class c0, wff w0, wff w1
body: |- wb(wrex(s0, c0, w0), wrex(s0, c0, w1))

body.origin:
|- wb(wrex(s0, c0, w0), wrex(s0, c0, w1))
-| wb(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wrex(s0, c0, w0), wrex(s0, c0, w1))
-| wb(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1))

body.origin:
|- wb(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1))
-| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wb(w0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wrex(s0, c0, w0), wrex(s0, c0, w1))
-| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wb(w0, w1))

comment: Inference adding restricted existential quantifier to both sides of an equivalence. (Contributed by NM, 26-Oct-1999.)
